enhanced: High entropy - excellent defense against ML models
lstm: Maintaining high recent entropy - prevents LSTM adaptation
markov: Full move variety prevents pattern learning

enhanced: High entropy and pattern breaking - well defended
lstm: Move bias detected - neural network will exploit this
markov: Good pattern variation - sequences are unpredictable

model_specific_advice.primary_strategy: Combine frequency balance with pattern breaking

enhanced.reasoning: Enhanced AI can exploit most human patterns

frequency.reasoning: Good move balance should perform well against frequency analysis

lstm.reasoning: LSTM networks excel at learning human behavioral patterns

markov.reasoning: Consistent patterns will be learned by Markov chains

random.reasoning: Random AI has no strategy to exploit patterns

adaptation_suggestions: Against enhanced AI: Use counter-exploitation and mixed strategies
Low recent performance: Try inverse of your recent strategy
Good variety: Focus on timing and sequence optimization

recommended_adjustments: Current approach isn't working - try a different strategy

educational_focus: Nash Equilibrium - Study optimal mixed strategies
Counter-AI Strategies - Learn to beat enhanced algorithms
Emotional Control - Manage tilt and frustration
strategic_opportunities: You're very unpredictable - maintain this randomness
weaknesses: Low win rate - current strategy isn't effective
